medicalLanding.banner_subtitle: The best diagnostic centre in the wilaya of Tiaret, at your disposal!
medicalLanding.about_subtitle: We are the 1st and only diagnostic centre at the level of Tiaret wilaya offering clinical, radiological and biological examens. Available from 07:00 to 00:00 (midnight) 7 days/7!
medicalLanding.expertise_subtitle: Our doctors are certified experts in any service offered by our centre!
medicalLanding.expertise_paragraph: Our team is always listening and ready to offer help to those who need it!
medicalLanding.footer_paragraph: We are always at your disposal!

doctorsData.name: BENTERIA Abdelkader
doctorsData.title: Clinic Owner
doctorsData.message: Hello everyone, I am Dr. Bentheria de Tiaret. I am principal and founder of Clinique Noor.

doctorsData.name: Benhlima Amine
doctorsData.title: International Medical Officer
doctorsData.message: Medical specialist in internal medicine Option Vascular diseases HTA, diabetes, endocrine diseases, treatment of varicose veins (sclerotherapy), ECG, vascular echodoppler, MAPA, Rhumatology

services.title: Analysis Laboratory
services.desc: This is where various biological fluids are collected and analyzed under the responsibility of our medical biologists.

services.title: Radiology
services.desc: The radiology department allows you to pass radiology tests that help physicians make more accurate diagnosing!

services.title: Scanner
services.desc: If you need more specialized and specific results, our Scanneur service is what you are looking for!

services.title: Pickup Room
services.desc: Our collection room is always in the best conditions for any collection session you need.

directorWord.title: A Word from the Director
directorWord.message: The essential goal of the Noor Clinic is to participate, and to contribute to the development and promotion of the health sector at the level of the Wilaya Rostomids; Wilaya de TIARET, and the surrounding wilayas. Also, we rely heavily on the medical, para-medical and administrative team of our clinic to serve our patients in better conditions. Thank you.

data.name: Noor Clinic
data.address: The clinic is located: Ettefah, Tiaret
